item.description:
2010 Boston Asian American Film Festival: Ideas in Motion
Fundraiser Launch Party

Join us in kicking off the 2010 Boston Asian American Film Festival with food, games, raffles and prizes!
...
Be among the first to hear this year's line up, watch previews, and support our festival!

Wednesday, October 20
Splash Ultra Lounge in Chinatown
6:30-9pm

$20 admission* includes nibbles, sponsor gift, a huge pat on the back from the volunteer planning committee, and a ticket to our ???? Raffle!

This is a 21+ event.

You'll have a chance to win:
- VIP pass to all the films during the festival
- ticket to the opening night film
- a classic BAAFF t-shirt
- gift certificate to Cafe de Lulu
- gift certificate to Pho Pasteur
- gift certificate to Eye Q

BUY YOUR ADMISSION TICKET BY OCTOBER 19 AND SAVE $5!
http://www.aarw.org/c...

The 2010 Boston Film Festival will be held Thursday, November 11 - Sunday, November 14, 2010. http://www.baaff.org/...

* Proceeds will support our festival so that we can continue to bring Asian American films to Boston.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Asian American Film Festival Launch Party
